page.title: 17Recreation.
page.content: Gateshead has an enviable reputation for encouraging recreation and when we asked local people to list amenities they used regularly their replies showed their appreciation of the council's efforts. Only l4% said they made no use of local facilities - but 7l% said parks and 55% swimming baths. Perhaps not surprizing in view of the fact that there are four large parks and three pools accessible to local people. Beggars Wood in Lobley Hill has woodland walks, picnic and play areas, as well as a pitch 'n' put course, while Chase Park, Whickham has tennis and a children's zoo. Saltwell Park with its boating lake and space for scramble bikes at Washingwell Woods completes the picture. Libraries (2l%) and Sports centres (6%) were popular amongst almost a dozen other choices listed.
